title: IO Scotfest: The Age of Voltaire - Nov 18-19
author: Philip Wadler
content: IOHK/IOG will be hosting a meeting at Edinburgh next week. Available online, plus an in-person meetup for folk near Edinburgh.Let’s celebrate the dawning of a new era for #Cardano together. Join us for a virtual event that will showcase the community’s achievements over the last 5 years & discuss IOG’s vision for the future of Cardano. Learn more: https://lnkd.in/g2bzZEtR
